e4c7a031-b4e0-4aad-a30e-f83b4a3d3fbd.description: This badge is part of the Delphix Academy for Partners - Masking Services training series. 30a1ff58-cda8-4711-8560-2fb88bcbddfb.description: This badge is part of the Delphix Academy - Virtualization Services training series. da8470d3-5ed7-4683-a4dd-b406387aea3c.description: Engineering Excellence Awards are an opportunity to recognize specific contributions by a team that goes above and beyond expectations and embodies our values. We take a broad view of impact across the business, organization, product, or culture, as well as how it was achieved.
da8470d3-5ed7-4683-a4dd-b406387aea3c.name: Engineering Excellence Team Award

badge_template_activities.title: This is a nomination-based award program in which peers are nominated by the Engineering team members. The nominations may be submitted in Individual or Team category. It is expected that anyone who has made a notable impact in the six months prior to the date when nominations are requested can be nominated.

0bf85d3b-1b5c-4463-b549-3b365d6173ed.description: The Delphix Hackathon is an internal event where Delphix employees take a few days to work on any project of their invention. The event spans the globe and culminates in a 2 minute demo/presentation of their results to a panel of judges. The People’s choice winner is just that. Everyone at Delphix can vote for their favorite hackathon project and the project with the most votes wins.
0bf85d3b-1b5c-4463-b549-3b365d6173ed.name: Delphix Engineering Hackathon Winner - People's Choice

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Delphix Corp.
Must submit a video of the hackathon project
Selected by a panel of judges for excellence in this category

c1d48448-8aac-4ad9-b5c0-f74dcd36660f.description: The Delphix Hackathon is an internal event where Delphix employees take a few days to work on any project of their invention. The event spans the globe and culminates in a 2 minute demo/presentation of their results to a panel of judges. The Expand TAM award goes to the project(s) that would best increase our total addressable market. These are projects that expand the customer base by addressing new use cases.
c1d48448-8aac-4ad9-b5c0-f74dcd36660f.name: Delphix Engineering Hackathon Winner - Expand TAM

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Delphix Corp.
Must submit a video of the hackathon project
Selected by a panel of judges for excellence in this category

b32895b8-daf9-4f96-bd35-e93afad00f55.description: The Delphix Hackathon is an internal event where Delphix employees take a few days to work on any project of their invention. The event spans the globe and culminates in a 2 minute demo/presentation of their results to a panel of judges. The Feature Area Revolution category is new for this hackathon. This was inspired by a group of projects that together would revolutionize a technology space.
b32895b8-daf9-4f96-bd35-e93afad00f55.name: Delphix Engineering Hackathon Winner - Feature Area Revolution

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Delphix Corp.
Must submit a video of the hackathon project
Selected by a panel of judges for excellence in this category

75439cd9-de99-4ee8-9cc4-6f5b1770f2da.description: Engineering Excellence Awards recognize specific contributions by an individual that goes above and beyond expectations and embodies our values. We take a broad view of impact across the business, organization, product, or culture, as well as how it was achieved.
75439cd9-de99-4ee8-9cc4-6f5b1770f2da.name: Engineering Excellence Individual Award

badge_template_activities.title: This is a nomination-based award program in which peers are nominated by the Engineering team members. The nominations may be submitted in Individual or Team category. It is expected that anyone who has made a notable impact in the six months prior to the date when nominations are requested can be nominated.

4f832f62-b576-4f01-a224-9ea8a0dc5858.description: The Delphix Hackathon is an internal event where Delphix employees take a few days to work on any project of their invention. The event spans the globe and culminates in a 2 minute demo/presentation of their results to a panel of judges. The Judge’s Choice is the project most universally recognized as outstanding by the judging panel. Similar to “Best in show” this project stood out and addressed a number of impact categories.
4f832f62-b576-4f01-a224-9ea8a0dc5858.name: Delphix Engineering Hackathon Winner - Judge's Choice

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Delphix Corp.
Must submit a video of the hackathon project
Selected by a panel of judges for excellence in this category

54c8f0df-912a-43b6-a5a8-caa52617d44a.description: Learners who have completed the Delphix Masking Algorithm SDK class have attended deep dive training on the Delphix Continuous Compliance Software Development Kit (SDK). They attended lectures from a Master Delphix Product Engineer, and they participated in developing complex custom Delphix Continuous Compliance algorithms using the API and creating the plugin/framework.
54c8f0df-912a-43b6-a5a8-caa52617d44a.name: Delphix Masking Algorithm SDK - Master Class

badge_template_activities.title: The Delphix Algorithm SDK Workshop includes 4 two-hour virtual sessions including a Deep Dive review on Delphix Continuous Compliance followed by deeper level discussions and activities around using the API and creating the plugin/framework.

7408870a-620f-4f63-997f-fc42b05967b0.description: The Delphix Hackathon is an internal event where Delphix employees take a few days to work on any project of their invention. The event spans the globe and culminates in a 2 minute demo/presentation of their results to a panel of judges. The Engineering Productivity award recognizes the best example of internal efficiency and/or improvement.
7408870a-620f-4f63-997f-fc42b05967b0.name: Delphix Engineering Hackathon Winner - Engineering Productivity

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Delphix Corp.

ddb9032d-6070-41e5-81ca-5058656cb634.description: This badge is awarded as the highest level achievement for our Continuous Compliance Service Providers.
